main event: Three elongated lights were observed moving across the sky in Apalachicola, Florida on August 6, 1967.
interesting points: The objects were seen traveling in a straight line at a constant speed in a general NE to SW direction.,Witnesses described the lights as elongated and yellowish, emitting no trail.,The sighting lasted approximately 60 seconds before the objects disappeared.,There were inconsistencies with known aircraft or natural phenomena.,No sound was reported during the sighting.
sighted object: three elongated yellowish lights in the sky
